hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that #a Gold Skulltula Token# can be found in #the Market#.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that #the Forest Temple# hoards #a Slingshot#.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that the #northern basement of the Water Temple# contains...^ #a Piece of Heart# and #a Gold Skulltula Token#.
hinted_locations: Water Temple GS Near Boss Key Chest

GC (Maze).text: You're playing a Randomizer. I'm randomized!^${12 48 31}Here's a random number:  #4#.&Enjoy your Randomizer!
